about.title: About the Company
about.description: One of the leading national companies in export, import, and general trading. We operate according to the highest quality standards in both the Sudanese and global markets, leveraging our strong position in healthcare, agriculture, and logistics sectors.

services.title: Our Fields & Activities
services.export_desc: Exporting authentic Sudanese crops (Gum Arabic, Sesame, Hibiscus) to global markets.
services.import_desc: Supplying pharmaceuticals, medical equipment, and industrial machinery with a sustainable vision.
services.supplies_desc: Providing agricultural machinery and heavy equipment to both government and private sectors.
services.thirdparty_desc: Integrated solutions from supplier selection to customs clearance and transportation.

vision.title: Our Vision & Mission
vision.vision_text: We aspire to become a globally leading company through strategic expansion and the establishment of international branches.
vision.mission_text: Delivering essential services that enrich local and regional markets while achieving sustainable development.

ports.title: Our Global Reach (Ports)
ports.desc: We work with major international ports to ensure fast and efficient supply chains.

cta.title: Ready to Partner With Us?
cta.subtitle: Contact us today and discover how we can support your business in export, import, and general supplies.
